page.title: 02Birdham Village
page.content: Birdham village is situated on the {A286}where the road divides to go to either{East or West Wittering.} There is no centre to the village. It has developed around a triangle of roads from which radiate further areas of housing. The{Church}is at the N apex, the{garage}and{stores}at the W and the two{public houses}at the S and W edges. The present{Primary School, {Village Hall,}playing field and Scout hut are all inside the triangle. There are{2 yachting marinas}with their own clubs and shops. There are mooring facilities in the{Harbour which forms the N boundary of the village. Along the main A286 road ther are numerous nurseries and industries.
